text: Jesse Lon Plemons (born April 2, 1988) is an American actor and comedian. He is known for playing Landry Clarke in the NBC drama series Friday Night Lights, Todd Alquist in the AMC crime drama series Breaking Bad, and Ed Blumquist in the second season of the FX anthology series Fargo. He has also appeared in movies such as Like Mike (2002), Observe and Report (2009), Battleship (2012), The Master (2012), Black Mass (2015), Bridge of Spies (2015) and The Post (2017). In 2017, he starred in the Black Mirror episode "USS Callister". Plemons was born in Dallas, Texas. He is engaged to actress Kirsten Dunst. They have a son. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American child actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Dallas Category:Actors from Dallas Category:Musicians from Dallas
title: Jesse Plemons
